name: countries-url
description: This list countries with important properties like fips code, ISO alpha 2 code, ISO alpha 3 code.

scripts.version-rebuild: npm version patch && npm version minor && npm version major
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release-patch: npm run version-patch && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm run version-minor && npm run release
scripts.release-major: npm run version-major && npm run release
scripts.release-rebuild: npm run version-rebuild && npm run release

author: Chidume Nnamdi
